title: How much less toxic this game would be if we could leave 4v5's early like ever other decent game

replies.body: Mind giving a few examples? I'm not sure what games you can leave early and not get punished.

The most prominent one I know about is DOTA 2. After a few minutes (i think like 5 or something, I never got into the game) of a player leaving the team that player was on gains the ability to leave without punishment. More casual games like CoD, Pubg, Hearthstone, etc also don't penalize you whether you're in a team game or not.
WOW has it right u can say anything in the game that u want and not get reported/banned u can also feed in pvp and nothing will happen to u
Would be pretty nice. Being in a losing 4v5 just feels aweful, when 2 people aren't surrendering because they are fed a little.
